title: For My Master
description: In Wickedly Wanton, a short story anthologyAgent Kathie Belmont has long lusted after her boss, Ross Guerrero, but has never even flirted with him. Could he be the strong but tender Master she craves?Ross wants Kathie in his lifeâ€”on her knees. But the constraints of their jobs with an ultra-secret US security agency have come between them. Will their undercover roles as a sex slave and her Master bring them together...forever?
author: Suz deMello
